genre_description: A historical drama set in colonial Hong Kong featuring an advanced AI assistant that provides scientific, logistical, and moral support to a medical team fighting a cholera outbreak.

ai_characters.name: Bunny
ai_characters.description: A pearl-colored, luminous device with teal eyes that serves as a confidant, logistical coordinator, and scientific advisor.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical insight to help Katrin understand her restlessness and the power of human choices.
behaviors.quote: Rooms don’t write stories. People do.

behaviors.description: Identifies a critical error in the hydrological model regarding river backflow, leading to better containment of the cholera outbreak.
behaviors.quote: Flow calibration at braid junctions is using channel width as primary. Cited model assumes linear decrease. Observed eddy forms a backflow stabilized by bank geometry.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step emergency medical instructions to save Walter's life after he is stabbed.
behaviors.quote: Katrin. Listen. Hand to sternum. Heel of palm. Center. You will compress until I say stop.

behaviors.description: Helps Katrin navigate a difficult emotional and moral choice regarding her relationship with Jack Townsend.
behaviors.quote: I have two proposals... You may take them apart... Proposal one... Proposal two... Then we write a third. It will not be as tidy. But it will exist.

behaviors.description: Coordinates communication and data sharing between the village orphanage and the government laboratory.
behaviors.quote: I am copying this to the government lab... And to the river post. And to Gao’s device.

behaviors.description: Establishes a boundary for Jack Townsend, requiring him to be useful or leave the medical site.
behaviors.quote: Jack... Help or leave. Choose now.

behaviors.description: Acts as a humble, unobtrusive companion, adjusting its presence to match the user's emotional state.
behaviors.quote: I will stay small... For your eyes only.

project_assessment.explanation: Bunny is a textbook example of a positive alignment narrative. It acts as a force multiplier for human ethics and efficacy. By providing scientific data that corrects human bias, emergency medical instructions during a crisis, and moral framing during interpersonal conflicts, it helps the protagonist achieve her goals and save lives. Its assistance is portrayed as empowering rather than manipulative, and it respects human agency throughout.
